description:
11.58 deblock
Remove blocking artifacts from input video.

The filter accepts the following options:

alpha.description: Set blocking detection threshold for exact edge of block. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.098.

beta.description: Set blocking detection threshold near the edge (below/above). Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.05.

block.description: Set size of block, allowed range is from 4 to 512. Default is 8.

delta.description: Set blocking detection threshold near the edge (left/right). Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.05.

filter.description: Set filter type, can be 'weak' or 'strong'. Default is 'strong'. This controls what kind of deblocking is applied.

gamma.description: Set blocking detection threshold near the edge (left/right). Allowed range is 0 to 1. Default is 0.05.

planes.description: Set planes to filter. Default is to filter all available planes.

name: deblock

parameters.description: Set filter type, can be weak or strong. Default is strong. This controls what kind of deblocking is applied.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Set size of block, allowed range is from 4 to 512. Default is 8.
parameters.name: block

parameters.description: Set blocking detection thresholds. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Defaults are: 0.098 for alpha and 0.05 for the rest. Using higher threshold gives more deblocking strength. Setting alpha controls threshold detection at exact edge of block. Remaining options controls threshold detection near the edge. Each one for below/above or left/right. Setting any of those to 0 disables deblocking.
parameters.name: alpha

parameters.description: Set blocking detection thresholds. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Defaults are: 0.098 for alpha and 0.05 for the rest. Using higher threshold gives more deblocking strength. Setting alpha controls threshold detection at exact edge of block. Remaining options controls threshold detection near the edge. Each one for below/above or left/right. Setting any of those to 0 disables deblocking.
parameters.name: beta

parameters.description: Set blocking detection thresholds. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Defaults are: 0.098 for alpha and 0.05 for the rest. Using higher threshold gives more deblocking strength. Setting alpha controls threshold detection at exact edge of block. Remaining options controls threshold detection near the edge. Each one for below/above or left/right. Setting any of those to 0 disables deblocking.
parameters.name: gamma

parameters.description: Set blocking detection thresholds. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Defaults are: 0.098 for alpha and 0.05 for the rest. Using higher threshold gives more deblocking strength. Setting alpha controls threshold detection at exact edge of block. Remaining options controls threshold detection near the edge. Each one for below/above or left/right. Setting any of those to 0 disables deblocking.
parameters.name: delta

parameters.description: Set planes to filter. Default is to filter all available planes.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.58 deblock

Remove blocking artifacts from input video.

The filter accepts the following options:

filter

Set filter type, can be weak or strong. Default is strong. This controls what kind of deblocking is applied.

block

Set size of block, allowed range is from 4 to 512. Default is 8.

alpha
beta
gamma
delta

Set blocking detection thresholds. Allowed range is 0 to 1. Defaults are: 0.098 for alpha and 0.05 for the rest. Using higher threshold gives more deblocking strength. Setting alpha controls threshold detection at exact edge of block. Remaining options controls threshold detection near the edge. Each one for below/above or left/right. Setting any of those to 0 disables deblocking.

planes

Set planes to filter. Default is to filter all available planes.
